name: Formula One 2001
overview: Officially licensed product of the 2001 FIA Formula One World Championship, licensed by Formula One Administration Ltd. • Full Season 2001 driver and team line-up • New Arcade mode featuring 34 tracks • 2 player racing against the full grid, either as team-mates or bitter rivals • Enhanced car damage: realistic collisions, punctures and blow-outs • Instant replay with rewind and slow-motion functions • Official commentary from TV's Murray Walker and Martin Brundle
